def in_bathroom(basket: item):
    symbol in_bathroom = exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(basket, room)
    return in_bathroom

behavior inspect_shirt(shirt: item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, shirt)

behavior wash_shirt(shirt: item):
    body:
        achieve dirty(shirt)
        wash(shirt)
        achieve clean(shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind basket: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and in_bathroom(basket)
        # Ensure that basket is inside bathroom

        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and inside(shirt, basket) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select a dirty shirt inside the basket in the bathroom

        inspect_shirt(shirt)
        wash_shirt(shirt)

behavior clean_shirt(shirt:item):

        achieve clean(shirt)

def find_iron_and_board():
    # Function to find an iron and an ironing board based on the available information
    symbol has_iron=exists i: item : is_iron(i) 
    # Determines whether there is an iron available in the scene
    symbol has_ironing_board=exists ib: item : is_ironing_board(ib) 
    # Checks if an ironing board is present in the scene
    
    return has_iron and has_ironing_board

behavior iron_shirt(iron:item, ironing_board:item, shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve is_cleaning_solution(shirt) 
        # Ensure that the shirt is clean before ironing
        achieve close_char(char, iron) 
        # Move the character close to the iron
        achieve close_char(char, ironing_board) 
        # Move the character close to the ironing board
        achieve plugged(iron) 
        # Plug in the iron before use
        achieve is_on(iron) 
        # Turn on the iron to start ironing
        achieve inhand(shirt) 
        # Hold the shirt while ironing
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board) 
        # Place the shirt on the ironing board for ironing
        achieve clean(shirt) 
        # Achieved after finishing ironing the shirt
        achieve_once is_off(iron) 
        # Turn off the iron after completing the task
        achieve_once unplugged(iron) 
        # Unplug the iron after completing the task

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if find_iron_and_board():
            bind iron: item where:
                is_iron(iron)
            bind ironing_board: item where:
                is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
            bind shirt: item where:
                is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and id[shirt] == 2086
            iron_shirt(iron, ironing_board, shirt)

behavior check_if_shirt_is_clean(clothes_shirt: item):
    body:
        observe(clothes_shirt, "Determine if clothes_shirt is dirty or clean")

behavior iron_the_shirt(clothes_shirt: item, iron: item, ironing_board: item):
    body:
        achieve on(clothes_shirt, ironing_board)
        achieve close_char(char, iron)
        achieve plugged(iron)
        achieve is_on(iron)
        achieve_once inhand(clothes_shirt)
        achieve clean(clothes_shirt)
        achieve unplugged(iron)
        achieve is_off(iron)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind basket_for_clothes_2006: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(basket_for_clothes_2006)
        bind clothes_shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(clothes_shirt) and inside(clothes_shirt, basket_for_clothes_2006)
        check_if_shirt_is_clean(clothes_shirt)

                is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
            bind iron: item where:

            iron_the_shirt(clothes_shirt, iron, ironing_board)

Question: Can you teach me how to "3. iron the shirt." ?
Answer: To iron a shirt, you should put the shirt on the iron board, then hold the iron, push and pu
ll.

Goal Representation:
behavior iron_shirt(shirt: item, ironing_board: item, iron: item):
    body:
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board) # Place the shirt on the ironing board
        achieve close_char(char, ironing_board) # Move character close to the ironing board
        achieve close_char(char, iron) # Move character close to the iron
        achieve plugged(iron) # Ensure the iron is plugged in
        achieve is_on(iron) # Turn on the iron
        achieve_once inhand(iron) # Temporarily hold the iron
        push(shirt) # Iron the shirt by pushing
        pull(shirt) # Finish ironing by pulling
        achieve is_off(iron) # Turn off the iron

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and id[shirt] == 2086
        # Select clothes_shirt_2086
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select an ironing board
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select an iron
        iron_shirt(shirt, ironing_board, iron)

def is_ironing_board_present():
    symbol has_ironing_board=exists board: item : is_ironing_board(board)
    return has_ironing_board

def is_iron_present():
    symbol has_iron=exists iron: item : is_iron(iron)
    return has_iron

behavior place_on_ironing_board(shirt:item, board:item):
    body:
        achieve on(shirt, board)

behavior use_iron(iron:item, shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(iron)
        push(iron)
        pull(iron)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and clean(shirt) and close_char(char, shirt)
        
        if not is_ironing_board_present():
            foreach board: item:
                if is_ironing_board(board) and not visited(board):
                    observe(board, "Check for availability of ironing board")

        if not is_iron_present():
            foreach iron: item:
                if is_iron(iron) and not visited(iron):
                    observe(iron, "Check for availability of iron")

        if is_ironing_board_present() and is_iron_present():
            bind board: item where:
                is_ironing_board(board)
            bind iron: item where:
                is_iron(iron)

            place_on_ironing_board(shirt, board)
            use_iron(iron, shirt)
